column1: Smoque BBQ////After you devour a platter of their bbq
column2: you'll think life can't get any better.  Then you'll turn to your peach cobbler and the day will go from great to unbelievable!  Be prepared to wait if you go right around dinner time
column3: but it will be worth every minute.  If you're concerned about the wait
column4: call in your order for pick up.
